snippet.title: Industria 2 - Official Gameplay Teaser Trailer | Games Baked in Germany Showcase
snippet.description:
Industria 2 is a narrative FPS adventure about a woman stranded in a parallel dimension. Explore, scavenge and fight your way through a mysterious boreal landscape consumed by an ever-hungry artificial intelligence to find a way home and return to her home dimension: 1989 East Berlin.

Industria 2 is coming to PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG). Visit Steam and add it to your wishlist now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2154070/INDUSTRIA_2/

#IGN #Gaming
